narrative:
*   This was a focused inspection limited to the three dogs cited under section 2.40 (b) (2) as a direct noncompliance
on July 7, 2014.   All three dogs ( microchip numbers  067 370 314  /   0A02303244  /  4533242720) were examined
by a veterinarian and treatment was prescribed.
*  The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
